properties.name: bgs.exception.display-stack-trace
properties.description: Whether to provide a stack trace in errors - useful for testing/debugging purposes on non-production environments. Fefault is `false`

properties.name: bgs.request-logging.enabled
properties.description: Whether to turn on/off the incoming request payload logging for application controllers. Defaults to `false`

properties.name: bgs.request-logging.exclude-paths
properties.description: A coma-separated value of AntPathMatcher URI patterns which should be excluded from logging. By default all requests will be logged.
